title: The booke of marchauntes very profitable to all folkes to knowe of what wares they ought to be ware of, for the begilyng of them. Newly perused and augmented by the first authoure well practised in suche doynges. Reade and profite.
author: Marcourt, Antoine de, d. ca. 1560.
publisher: [[By J. Day?] and] are to be sold by Richard Iugge, at the North doore of Pouls. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum],
